cc.adjusting

Interface ChineseCharacterTypeAdjuster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MergePieceAdjuster, SimpleAreaAdjuster, SimpleImageAdjuster, SimplePieceAdjuster

    public interface ChineseCharacterTypeAdjuster
    活字調整工具。依活字結構（ChineseCharacterMovableType）本身的組合調整大小位置粗細…等等資訊。

    Author:
    Ihc
